channel.description: Recent content in Nvim on Raj Patil

item.title: Python like a Spartan
item.description: I’m an AI Research Engineer and that involves messing around a little with python. I’ve spent the past 4 years perfecting a disciplined, minimal, but enabling setup. This is a tour of my trusty set of tools, in the hopes that it will help you find the same CLI zen that I’ve been enjoying for a while now. Tmux : towards an Eternal Shell I start my work sessions off by ssh’ing into my remote compute cluster.
